title: Fees and Donations
subtitle: It's about give and take
body:
### Fees

LamboMoon has a variable mining fee that decreases from 5% to 1% as the number miners/hashing power increases. This is to ensure that the costs of running the pool can be met and contributions can be made to the coin communities, while keeping miners' rewards as high as possible.

#### How much does it cost to run this pool?

So glad you asked! LamboMoon aims to be as transparent as possible about the costs associated with the pool and the revenue earned – below is a brief breakdown of both. These figures are approximate but more detailed and accurate info will be made available very soon.

|                 |                                                                                                              
------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Provider                                                                | [Digital Ocean](https://www.digitalocean.com/pricing/)
Average monthly cost                                      | **$232.28**  
Average monthly revenue                              | **$141.00**
Revenue after donation                                  | **$130**
Average profit                                                    | **-$101.28**

Each coin uses RAM and disk space – *lots of disk space* – to store each cryptocurrency's entire blockchain. LamboMoon is still in its infancy, so operates at a loss, but as it grows and breaks even, the mining fee will be decreased until it reaches 1%.


### LamboMoon donates

LamboMoon currently donates 10% of the mining fee (0.5% of the block reward) to the projects listed below. The percentage donated from the block reward remains fixed, so that as the mining fee decreases, the percentage donated from the revenue *increases*.

In other words, once the mining fee decreases to 1%, **we'll be donating 50%** of the mining fee to these projects:

[BitcoinZ](http://btcz.rocks): t1fHHnAXxoPWGY77sG5Zw2sFfGUTpW6BcSZ  
[SnowGem](http://snowgem.org): s1aUpbqEWaKoj54t7d3LCf9hMmnCXJdBDvt
